application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Rear gardenT1	Bay x 1	(Laurus nobilis)	This tree growing close to property close is in the wrong location.Suggested works:- Fell to ground level by sectional take Rear gardenS1	Stump/s x 1	Grind down stump to approx. 300mm below ground levelRear gardenT2	Populus spp x 1	This suppressed tree is heavily leaning into garden.Suggested works:- Fell to ground level by sectional take downRear gardenS2	Stump/s x 1	Grind down stump to approx. 300mm below ground levelRear gardenT3	Dead Tree x 1	Suggested works:	- Fell to ground levelRear gardenS3	Stump/s x 1	Grind down stump to approx. 300mm below ground levelRear gardenT4	Olive x 1	(Olea europaea)	To shape and maintain.Suggested works:- Reduce in height approx. 4m and reduce laterally by approx. 1-2m
